Template tags¶

Html rendering template tags for form builder app.

form_builder.templatetags.formbuilder.as_js_variable(value, type)¶

Method to return value as javascript variable.

Parameters:
  • value – Python value
  • type – Type
Returns:

Javascript value

Authors: Gagandeep Singh

form_builder.templatetags.formbuilder.as_js_variable_auto(value)¶

Method to automatically detect and convert python value to javascript value.

Parameters:value – Python value
Returns:Javascript value

Authors: Gagandeep Singh

form_builder.templatetags.formbuilder.get_trans_from_lookup(lookup_dict, id)¶

Method to lookup translatio from translation dictionary.

Parameters:
  • lookup_dict – Lookup translation dict
  • id – Key
Returns:

Translation

Authors: Gagandeep Singh

Method to check if component is a form condition.

Parameters:node – component
Returns:bool

Authors: Gagandeep Singh

form_builder.templatetags.formbuilder.is_field(node)¶

Method to check if component is a form field.

Parameters:node – component
Returns:bool

Authors: Gagandeep Singh

form_builder.templatetags.formbuilder.is_instance(value, class_str)¶

Check if object is instance of given class.

Authors: Gagandeep Singh :param value: Object value :param class_str: Class name :return: bool
